questions:
What is the main subject of the photo?
A) A person
B) A clock
C) A painting
D) A sculpture

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A clock face
B) A person
C) A building
D) A painting

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Trees and nature
B) A window with a grid pattern
C) A city skyline
D) A beach

What kind of numbers are on the clock?
A) Roman numerals
B) Arabic numerals
C) Binary digits
D) Numbers watch

What is the color of the clock?
A) Silver
B) Gold
C) Black
D) White

What time does the clock show?  
A) 10:10  
B) 11:05  
C) 2:30  
D) 3:23

What type of structure is visible in the background?
A) A modern glass building
B) A historic building with a grid window
C) A natural landscape
D) An abstract art installation

What is the shape of the clock?
A) Circular
B) Square
C) Triangular
D) Oval

What is the purpose of the clock in this setting?
A) Decoration
B) Functional timekeeping
C) Art installation
D) Advertisement

How many clock faces are visible in the photo?
A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Four

What is the primary color of the clock face?
A) Black
B) White
C) Blue
D) Red

What is the design of the clock hands?
A) Simple and straight
B) Ornate and decorative
C) Digital display
D) Invisible

What is the texture of the clock's surface?
A) Smooth and polished
B) Rough and matte
C) Textured and rugged
D) Soft and fabric-like

What is the height of the clock relative to its surroundings?
A) Shorter
B) Taller
C) Same height
D) Cannot be determined

How many sides of the clock are visible?
A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Four

What element is at the top of the clock?
A) A decorative finial
B) A weather vane
C) A flag
D) A light bulb

What is the main color of the background structure?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Beige
D) Green

What kind of design does the clock's pedestal have?
A) Simple and plain
B) Ornate and detailed
C) Modern and sleek
D) Minimalistic

What is the relationship between the clock and the background structure?
A) The clock is part of the structure
B) The clock is in front of the structure
C) The clock is behind the structure
D) The clock is separate from the structure

What kind of architectural elements are visible on the clock?
A) Columns and arches
B) Finials and moldings
C) Beams and trusses
D) Bricks and tiles

What kind of pattern is on the windows in the background?
A) Striped
B) Checkered
C) Grid
D) Floral

What is the likely function of the clock in its setting?
A) Decorative
B) Functional
C) Symbolic
D) Artistic

What kind of decorative element is at the top of the clock?
A) A flower
B) A finial
C) A star
D) A bird

What is the relationship between the clock and its surroundings?
A) The clock contrasts with its surroundings
B) The clock blends in with its surroundings
C) The clock is hidden by its surroundings
D) The clock dominates its surroundings

What is the photo's perspective?
A) Eye level
B) Bird's eye view
C) Worm's eye view
D) Angled view

What architectural feature is visible behind the clock?
A) Arches
B) Columns
C) Windows with grilles
D) Paintings
